LanguageData.RCT_Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.label: aesthete
LanguageData.RCT_Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves beautiful things, and really cares about how [PAWN_possessive] enviroment looks.
LanguageData.RCT_AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.label: animal lover
LanguageData.RCT_AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] loves animals. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
LanguageData.RCT_AnimalHater.degreeDatas.0.label: animal hater
LanguageData.RCT_AnimalHater.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] just isn't an "animal person." [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like [PAWN_objective], either.
LanguageData.RCT_Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.label: bipolar
LanguageData.RCT_Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is prone to extreme mood swings. When [PAWN_pronoun]'s happy, [PAWN_pronoun] can be very happy, but when [PAWN_pronoun]'s sad, [PAWN_pronoun] can become dangerously depressed.
LanguageData.RCT_Builder.degreeDatas.0.label: builder
LanguageData.RCT_Builder.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But [PAWN_pronoun] tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
LanguageData.RCT_Butcher.degreeDatas.0.label: butcher
LanguageData.RCT_Butcher.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys preparing meat for cooking. [PAWN_possessive] butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if [PAWN_pronoun]'s dealing with animal corpses. [PAWN_pronoun]'s terrible with mechanoids.
LanguageData.RCT_Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.label: claustrophobic
LanguageData.RCT_Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is claustrophobic. [PAWN_pronoun] is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
LanguageData.RCT_ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.label: cold lover
LanguageData.RCT_ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves colder temperatures. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
LanguageData.RCT_DeepSleeper.degreeDatas.0.label: deep sleeper
LanguageData.RCT_Dunce.degreeDatas.0.label: dunce
LanguageData.RCT_Dunce.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
LanguageData.RCT_Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.label: gourmet
LanguageData.RCT_Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for food preparation. [PAWN_possessive] culinary creations are quite tasty, but [PAWN_pronoun] tends to take a while getting them "just right."
LanguageData.RCT_HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.label: heat lover
LanguageData.RCT_HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves the heat. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
LanguageData.RCT_Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.label: inept
LanguageData.RCT_Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_pronoun] means well, but [PAWN_nameDef] is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
LanguageData.RCT_Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.label: coordinated
LanguageData.RCT_Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.label: unstoppable
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. [PAWN_pronoun] is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.label: ironman
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] has a high tolerance for pain.
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.2.label: low pain tolerance
LanguageData.RCT_PainThreshold.degreeDatas.2.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
LanguageData.RCT_Inventor.degreeDatas.0.label: inventor
LanguageData.RCT_Inventor.degreeDatas.0.description: Strange new ideas just appear in [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] always seems distracted.
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.label: near-sighted
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a hard time seeing things clearly unless [PAWN_pronoun] is relatively close to them.
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.label: eagle-eyed
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.2.label: far-sighted
LanguageData.RCT_Eyesight.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a hard time seeing things clearly unless [PAWN_pronoun] is relatively far from them.
LanguageData.RCT_NeatFreak.degreeDatas.0.label: neat freak
LanguageData.RCT_EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.label: nibbler
LanguageData.RCT_EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] picks at [PAWN_possessive] food, taking extra time to finish [PAWN_possessive] meals.
LanguageData.RCT_EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.label: glutton
LanguageData.RCT_EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] devours [PAWN_possessive] meals much faster than others.
LanguageData.RCT_Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.label: nyctophobe
LanguageData.RCT_Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is really afraid of the dark.
LanguageData.RCT_Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.label: nyctophile
LanguageData.RCT_Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't fear the dark at all.
LanguageData.RCT_Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.label: perfectionist
LanguageData.RCT_Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] refuses to accept less than [PAWN_possessive] best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. [PAWN_pronoun]'s less likely to fail when doing something, but [PAWN_pronoun] works slowly.
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.0.label: poor medic
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.0.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. [PAWN_nameDef] is one of those people.
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.1.label: skilled medic
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will likely fare well.
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.2.label: master medic
LanguageData.RCT_Medic.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between [PAWN_possessive] steady, skilled hands and [PAWN_possessive] inspiring bedside manner, patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will have little to fear.
LanguageData.RCT_QuickLearner.degreeDatas.0.label: quick learner
LanguageData.RCT_QuickLearner.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
LanguageData.RCT_Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.label: rockhound
LanguageData.RCT_Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys working with rocks. [PAWN_possessive] mining speed is increased, but [PAWN_possessive] lack of interest in other areas slows [PAWN_objective] down when doing other jobs. And [PAWN_pronoun] hates working with plants.
LanguageData.RCT_Savant.degreeDatas.0.label: savant
LanguageData.RCT_Savant.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But [PAWN_pronoun]'s almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
LanguageData.RCT_Dodging.degreeDatas.0.label: sluggish
LanguageData.RCT_Dodging.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
LanguageData.RCT_Dodging.degreeDatas.1.label: swift reflexes
LanguageData.RCT_Dodging.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
LanguageData.RCT_Trader.degreeDatas.0.label: sucker
LanguageData.RCT_Trader.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll pay more than [PAWN_pronoun] should, and still think that [PAWN_pronoun] got a good deal.
LanguageData.RCT_Trader.degreeDatas.1.label: haggler
LanguageData.RCT_Trader.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to get better prices than most people.
LanguageData.RCT_Trader.degreeDatas.2.label: master trader
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.label: deadshot
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.label: uncouth
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? [PAWN_nameDef] barely even understands the meaning of the words.
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.label: diplomat
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.label: master diplomat
LanguageData.RCT_Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has such a way with words that [PAWN_pronoun] always manages to cool down a tense situation. [PAWN_pronoun] could talk for days and people would still listen.
LanguageData.RCT_Constitution.degreeDatas.0.label: weak constitution
LanguageData.RCT_Constitution.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
LanguageData.RCT_Constitution.degreeDatas.1.label: strong constitution
LanguageData.RCT_Constitution.degreeDatas.1.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
